content: row 1 of chevron pattern in selected size pm pick up 1 extra st in the ladder from the row below and k tbl pick up and k 14 16 18 sts along your heel flap round 1 k to 2 sts before marker k2tog sm work next row of the chevron pattern in selected size across the front of sock sm ssk k to end of round round 2 k to m sm work next row of the chevron pattern in selected size across the front of sock sm k to end of round 3 dawn and dusk socks by debbie ford abbreviations pm place marker k2tog knit 2 stitches together bor beginning of round knit knit sm slip marker k tbl knit through the back loop yo bring the yarn forward and over the right- hand needle creating a stitch purl purl repeat sts between brackets the indicated ssk sl1 knitwise sl1 knitwise place both sts number of times back on the left needle and k2tog through the back loop sl1 slip 1 st purlwise with yarn at back chevron charts small medium large chevron written instructions all sizes row 1 k0 1 2 p1 k2tog x2 yo k1 x3 yo ssk x2 p1 k2 4 6 p1 k2tog x2 yo k1 x3 yo ssk x2 p1 k0 1 2 28 32 36 sts row 2 k28 32 36 4 dawn and dusk socks by debbie ford
